mapper.sql: id, platform_code, series_code, model_code, base_model_code, code, name, name_en, vehicle_stage_code, exterior_code, interior_code, wheel_code, tire_code, spare_tire_code, adas_code, seat_code, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_veh_build_config ( id, platform_code, series_code, model_code, base_model_code, code, name, name_en, vehicle_stage_code, exterior_code, interior_code, wheel_code, tire_code, spare_tire_code, adas_code, seat_code, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{platformCode}, #{seriesCode}, #{modelCode}, #{baseModelCode}, #{code}, #{name}, #{nameEn}, #{vehicleStageCode}, #{exteriorCode}, #{interiorCode}, #{wheelCode}, #{tireCode}, #{spareTireCode}, #{adasCode}, #{seatCode}, #{enable}, #{sort}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_veh_build_config ( id, platform_code, series_code, model_code, base_model_code, code, name, name_en, vehicle_stage_code, exterior_code, interior_code, wheel_code, tire_code, spare_tire_code, adas_code, seat_code, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.platformCode}, #{item.seriesCode}, #{item.modelCode}, #{item.baseModelCode}, #{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.nameEn}, #{item.vehicleStageCode}, #{item.exteriorCode}, #{item.interiorCode}, #{item.wheelCode}, #{item.tireCode}, #{item.spareTireCode}, #{item.adasCode}, #{item.seatCode}, #{item.enable}, #{item.sort}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_veh_build_config t SET
t.name = #{name},
t.name_en = #{nameEn},
t.vehicle_stage_code = #{vehicleStageCode},
t.exterior_code = #{exteriorCode},
t.interior_code = #{interiorCode},
t.wheel_code = #{wheelCode},
t.tire_code = #{tireCode},
t.spare_tire_code = #{spareTireCode},
t.adas_code = #{adasCode},
t.seat_code = #{seatCode},
t.enable = #{enable},
t.sort = #{sort},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_veh_build_config t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_veh_build_config t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_veh_build_config t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1
SELECT FROM tb_veh_build_config t WHERE t.row_valid = 1 AND t.code = #{code} LIMIT 1
